mapper.select: SELECT 1 AS SEQNO , '사번' AS CHK_CLAUSE , MGR_ID AS CHK_VALUE FROM MGR WHERE MGR_ID = ${mgrId}

SELECT MGR_ID FROM MGR_LOGIN_HIS WHERE 1 = 1
AND LOG_DATE < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') - 90 AND LOG_TYPE = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE MGR SET MGR_PWD = XX1.ENC_VARCHAR2_INS(#{mgrPwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 10, 'PWD', 'MGR_PWD_HIST', 'PWD_NO') ,MGR_PWD_CHG_DATE = SYSDATE ,MGR_STATE_CD = 'Y' ,LOGIN_FAIL_CNT = 0 WHERE MGR_ID = #{mgrId}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) AS PASSWORD_HIST_CNT FROM MGR_PWD_HIST WHERE MGR_ID = #{mgrId}
AND MGR_PWD = XX1.ENC_VARCHAR2_INS(#{mgrPwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 10, 'PWD', 'MGR_PWD_HIST', 'PWD_NO')
SELECT MGR_ID , MGR_NAME , (SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.STRING ('X', 10) FROM DUAL) AS INIT_PASSWD FROM MGR WHERE MGR_ID = #{mgrId} AND MGR_NAME = #{mgrName}
mapper.update: UPDATE MGR SET MGR_PWD = XX1.ENC_VARCHAR2_INS(#{initPasswd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 10, 'PWD', 'MGR_PWD_HIST', 'PWD_NO') ,MGR_PWD_CHG_DATE = SYSDATE-100 ,MGR_STATE_CD = 'Y' ,LOGIN_FAIL_CNT = 0 WHERE MGR_ID = #{mgrId}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CHECK_PASSWORD FROM MGR WHERE MGR_ID = #{mgrId} AND MGR_PWD = XX1.ENC_VARCHAR2_INS(#{mgrOldPwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 10, 'PWD', 'MGR_PWD_HIST', 'PWD_NO')
